required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Management of Peyronie's Disease With Adipose Tissue Stem Cell
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of Adipose Tissue Stem Cell Injection Through Corpora Cavernosa and Intra Dorsal Penile Artery in Management of Erectile Dysfunction Associated With Peyronie's Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: Man Clinic for Andrology, Male Infertility and Sexual Dysfunction

clinical_study.source: Man Clinic for Andrology, Male Infertility and Sexual Dysfunction

brief_summary.textblock: Erectile dysfunction is growing in prevalence all over the world and one of the most existing disease in old age patients There is many lines of treatment concerning the status of patient like psychosexual, medical, and surgical treatment But Pyronie's disease is common now among people especially diabetics, and the role of treatment still controversial in results We can start conservative treatment and then surgical treatment if fail but the outcome still not convinced Many patients refuse to fix penile prosthesis and to make operation like nesbite for probability of shortening of penis We start to use stem cell in patients have erectile dysfunction and Peyronie's disease The injection of stem cell will be at corpora cavernosa and intra dorsal penile artery under Doppler device guidance

detailed_description.textblock: Peyronie's disease associated with erectile dysfunction nan be treated by different methods We start to treat such patients with adipose tissue stem cell Harvesting stem cell from adipose tissue and injected into corpora cavernosa and penile artery and we assess quality of erection through patient history and penile duplex and also assess plaque size and other symptoms related to Peyronie's disease

primary_outcome.description: Clinical history of patients before and after treatment Penile duplex study

secondary_outcome.description: Clinical examination Patient history Penile duplex

arm_group.description: The stem cell will be harvested by liposuction and injection will be at corpora cavernosa and dorsal penile artery

intervention.description: Stem cell will be harvested through adipose tissue by liposuction and isolation occurred Injection will distribute through corpora cavernosa and dorsal penile artery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- erectile dysfunction associated with Peyroni's diseas
Exclusion Criteria:

facility.name: Man clinic for andrology and male infertility

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Man Clinic for Andrology, Male Infertility and Sexual Dysfunction

clinical_study.keyword: Erectile dysfunction, Peyronie's disease, stem cell
